# Tablas - Sexo


```{r echo = FALSE}
tab <- data %>%
     tab_prepend_names() %>% 
     tab_cols(total(),DC02) %>% 
	tab_cells(Q00222,
	          Q00223,
	          Q00224,
	          Q00240,
	          Q00251,
	          Q00252,
	          Q00260,
	          mrset(..f(Q00270_))
	          ) %>%
	tab_stat_cpct() %>%
     tab_cells(Q00210, Q00221) %>% 
     tab_stat_mean_sd_n() %>% 
     tab_pivot() %>% 
	tab_caption('Objetivo 2')
as.datatable_widget(tab, width=900)
```
